price: Shumica e tyre meritojnë dënimin Tonë, se ata nuk besojnë.
arabic: لَقَدۡ حَقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَىٰٓ أَكۡثَرِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: laqad ḥaqqa al-qawlu ʿalā aktharihim fahum lā yu'minūna
